nodes.text: The Drellik family was a Human family that had a history of military service in the Sith Empire, producing numerous decorated soldiers for the Imperial Military. Drellik was a member of the family who was the father of two sons and held the rank of Moff during the Cold War. His son Talos became an officer in the Imperial Reclamation Service, while Talos's brother was found to be Force-sensitive and was taken to Korriban for training by Darth Marr.
